Copado Success
Hi {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
Welcome to the Copado Success Community!
The Success Community offers you the possibility to learn, test and connect with Copado, all from one place.
To verify your account, click on the link below and set up your initial password:
{!Community_Url}
Your username is {!Receiving_User.Username}.
Best Regards, {!Organization.Name}
